amendment.description: To urge the prompt submission of interim reports on residual beryllium contamination at Department of Energy vendor facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2556 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2556 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12787) To urge the prompt submission of interim reports on residual beryllium contamination at Department of Energy vendor facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2556 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2556 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Nelson FL.
